name: Pine Scented Soy Candle in Beautiful Vintage Glass
description:
This listing is for one refreshing Pine Tree scented candle, it would it would really a beautiful Christmas/Holiday decoration! The container is 5 .75 inches tall, 4.5 inches wide and is re-usable. The burn time is about 20+ hours! Thus beautiful glass goblet is vintage and such a vibrant green! Just wash the empty container with warm water and soap when the candle is finished and it will be ready to use decorating your house! 

All of our candles are Eco-friendly; we use soy wax and 100% unbleached, cotton wicks. Each candle is hand poured. Most of the containers are vintage tumblers, mugs, glasses, canisters! Soy wax candles are clean burning candles that do not emit toxins in the air as other candle waxes do. You won't see ashy soot coming from our candles, and you can relax easily knowing that our candles are a healthy alternative.

 For Best Results: With each light, let the wax create a full pool (from side to side) before extinguishing. For longer life, try to let one candle burn for no longer than four hours with each light.

name: Unscented Soy Candle in Ocean Theme Mug
description:

Unscented Soy Candle in Ocean Theme Mug

Sometimes you already have a candle scent you really like and just want an unscented accent candle, if so, this is the candle for you!
   
This listing is for one unscented Soy candle, it is 3.5 inches tall, 3 inches wide and the mugis re-usable. The burn time is about 15+ hours! Just wash the empty container with warm water and soap when the candle is finished and it will be ready to use for drinking out of or decorating your house! 

All of our candles are Eco-friendly; we use 100% soy wax and 100% unbleached, cotton wicks. Each candle is hand poured. Most of the containers are vintage tumblers, mugs, glasses, canisters! 
Soy wax candles are clean burning candles that do not emit toxins in the air as other candle waxes do. You won't see ashy soot coming from our candles, and you can relax easily knowing that our candles are a healthy alternative. 

For Best Results: With each light, let the wax create a full pool (from side to side) before extinguishing. For longer life, try to let one candle burn for no longer than four hours with each light.

name: Vanilla and Mint Scented Soy Candle
description:
This listing is for one refreshing Vanilla/Mint scented candle, it is in a beautiful vintage glass pedestal bowl which stands 4 inches tall and 4 1/4 inches wide. The burn time is about 15+ hours! Just wash the empty container with warm water and soap when the candle is finished and it will be ready to use for drinking out of or decorating your house! 

All of our candles are Eco-friendly; we use 100% soy wax and 100% unbleached, cotton wicks. Each candle is hand poured. Most of the containers are vintage tumblers, mugs, glasses, canisters! Soy wax candles are clean burning candles that do not emit toxins in the air as other candle waxes do. You won't see ashy soot coming from our candles, and you can relax easily knowing that our candles are a healthy alternative.

 For Best Results: With each light, let the wax create a full pool (from side to side) before extinguishing. For longer life, try to let one candle burn for no longer than four hours with each light.


Orders will be carefully packaged and mailed USPS first class within 2-3 days of purchase.

name: Beautiful Cobalt Blue Candle Holders
description: This is a set of three candle holder, the two larger ones are the same size (about 4 inches in width, 3 inches in height) and the smaller one in about an inch smaller in width but is the same height! They are beautiful!

name: Salt and Pepper Piggies
description: These adorable vintage salt and pepper shakers are 3" tall "2 1/2 " wide, both have their tiny plastic corks!
